00018 #ifndef __CHECKANDCAST_H
00019 #define __CHECKANDCAST_H
00020 
00021 #include <typeinfo>
00022 #include "simkerneldefs.h"
00023 #include "cownedobject.h"
00024 #include "cexception.h"
00025 #include "cmodule.h"
00026 #include "csimulation.h"
00027 
00028 NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00029 
00030 template<class P, class T>
00031 void check_and_cast_failure(T *p, P ret)
00032 {
00033     const cObject *o = dynamic_cast<const cObject *>(p);
00034     if (o)
00035         throw cRuntimeError("check_and_cast(): cannot cast (%s*)%s to type '%s'",
00036                 o->getClassName(),
00037                 o->getOwner()==simulation.getContextModule() ? o->getFullName() : o->getFullPath().c_str(),
00038                 opp_typename(typeid(P)));
00039     else
00040         throw cRuntimeError("check_and_cast(): cannot cast '%s*' to type '%s'",
00041                 opp_typename(typeid(T)),
00042                 opp_typename(typeid(P)));
00043 }
00044 
00061 template<class P, class T>
00062 P check_and_cast(T *p)
00063 {
00064     if (!p)
00065         throw cRuntimeError("check_and_cast(): cannot cast NULL pointer to type '%s'",opp_typename(typeid(P)));
00066     P ret = dynamic_cast<P>(p);
00067     if (!ret)
00068         check_and_cast_failure(p, ret);
00069     return ret;
00070 }
00071 
00077 template<class P, class T>
00078 P check_and_cast_nullable(T *p)
00079 {
00080     if (!p)
00081         return NULL;
00082     P ret = dynamic_cast<P>(p);
00083     if (!ret)
00084         check_and_cast_failure(p, ret);
00085     return ret;
00086 }
